wikipedia_page.main: Henry Kerr Longman (8 March 1881 – 7 October 1958) was an English first-class cricketer active 1901–21 who played for Middlesex, Surrey, Marylebone Cricket Club (MCC) and Cambridge University. He was born in Kensington; died in Woking.

response: George Henry Longman (3 August 1852 – 19 August 1938) was an English first-class cricketer. Longman was a right-handed batsman who played occasionally as a wicketkeeper.

link_mentions.page: List of Marylebone Cricket Club players (1919–1939)
response: * Henry Longman (1920) : H. K. Longman (Middlesex, Surrey)
